Class Team

java.lang.Object
cycling.Team

public class Team extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a team of riders

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the ream, should not be null or empty
      Returns:
      String of the name of the team

    • setName

      public void setName(String newName)
      Sets the name of the team - should not be null or empty
      Parameters:
      newName - String new name that abides by rules of name

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Gets the ID of team, each team should have a unique ID
      Returns:
      int unique ID of team

    • setID

      public void setID(int newId)
      Sets ID of team, should be unique and only be set at team creation to avoid issues
      Parameters:
      newId - unique int ID number to identify team

    • getDesc

      public String getDesc()
      Gets the description of team
      Returns:
      String, may be much longer than name

    • setDesc

      public void setDesc(String newDesc)
      Sets the description of the team
      Parameters:
      newDesc - String, not restricted by size or contents

    • getRiders

      public ArrayList<Integer> getRiders()
      Gets a list of rider IDs that are in the team
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Integers, each an ID of a rider in the team

    • addRider

      public void addRider(Integer riderId)
      Adds a rider to the team, rider should not already be in team
      Parameters:
      riderId - Integer ID of rider to be added

    • removeRider

      public void removeRider(Integer riderId)
      Removes a rider from the team, rider should already be in team
      Parameters:
      riderId - Integer ID of rider to be removed
